name: Soup: the Game
description: Soup: The Game is a micro-strategy experience in which you wage war against opposing microorganisms. It features minimalistic, intuitive controls and great depth of unit interaction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Capable (Everything Made Since 2004) Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Capable (Everything Made Since 2004) Storage: 256 MB available space
